title: Lying and Deception - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/20/19
itunes:title: Lying and Deception - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/20/19
description:
George Noory and law enforcement expert Peter Hyatt discuss his work analyzing statements to discover when people are lying, and offers tips on how to spot when people are lying to you.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
